preface.title: Providing feedback on Red Hat documentation
preface.simpara: We appreciate your feedback on our documentation. To provide feedback, you can highlight the text in a document and add comments. Follow the steps in the procedure to learn about submitting feedback on Red Hat documentation.

listitem.simpara: Log in to the Red Hat Customer Portal.
In the Red Hat Customer Portal, view the document in Multi-page HTML format.
Click Feedback to see existing reader comments.

note.simpara: The feedback feature is enabled only in the Multi-page HTML format.

listitem.simpara: Highlight the section of the document where you want to provide feedback.
In the prompt menu that displays near the text you selected, click Add Feedback.
A text box opens in the feedback section on the right side of the page.
Enter your feedback in the text box and click Submit.
You have created a documentation issue.
To view the issue, click the issue tracker link in the feedback view.
